channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israelis Set a Palestinian Village Ablaze in West Bank Attack
item.description: The violence last week in Kafr Malik, in the West Bank, comes amid a surge in assaults by Israeli settlers. It also set off a chain of violence in the...

item.title: The White House took down the nation's top climate report. You can still find it here
item.description: The National Climate Assessment is the most influential source of information about climate change in the United States.

item.title: Televangelist Jimmy Swaggart dies at age 90
item.description: Jimmy Swaggart, one of the most well-known televangelists of the 1980s, has died, according to a social media post from his ministry.

item.title: RFK Jr. singled out one study to cut funds for global vaccines. Is that study valid?
item.description: When RFK Jr. announced he would cut funds from Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance, he cited "vaccine safety," referring to a 2017 study from Guinea-Bissau. We...

item.title: Zohran Mamdani Wins N.Y.C. Mayoral Primary in Decisive 12-Point Victory
item.description: Mr. Mamdani roundly defeated Andrew M. Cuomo in the Democratic contest, widening his primary-night lead by a significant margin once ranked-choice tab...

item.title: The Trump admin is withholding over $6 billion in education grants for schools
item.description: The federal grant funding traditionally goes out by July 1. It includes support for migrant education, after-school programs and English language lear...

item.title: How Zohran Mamdani Stunned New York and Won the Primary for Mayor
item.description: Mr. Mamdani’s victory upended city politics and reverberated nationally. He relied on a memorable message, charisma and a strong ground game.

item.title: Waffle House drops egg surcharge as prices fall back to Earth
item.description: Waffle House has dropped its 50 cent surcharge on eggs as supplies rebound. The chain added the temporary charge in February, when avian flu sent egg ...

item.title: What to Know About the Heat Wave in Europe

item.title: Explosion at Indian Pharmaceutical Factory Kills 36
item.description: It was not immediately clear what led to the blast at a factory near Hyderabad, but officials said initial clues suggested a pressure buildup in a dry...

item.title: Senate Version of Trump’s Policy Bill Ends Many Clean Energy Credits
item.description: By ending tax credits for wind and solar power, Senate Republicans may have jeopardized billions in investments in their own districts.

item.title: JD Vance Tells the Truth About the ‘Big, Beautiful Bill’
item.description: Vance’s posts about the reconciliation package reveal the true nature of Trump’s populism.
